metadata.Title: CVE-2020-6107 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - medium.
metadata.Description: An exploitable information disclosure vulnerability exists in the dev_read functionality of F2fs-Tools F2fs.Fsck 1.13. A specially crafted f2fs filesystem can cause an uninitialized read resulting in an information disclosure. An attacker can provide a malicious file to trigger this vulnerability.

criterions.comment: f2fs-tools package in hirsute is affected and may need fixing.
